event.title: was owned in what is now

data.event: According to government records, the first land that was owned in what is now known as Portland was owned by Elisha Newman in 1833.

event.title: was owned by Elisha Newman in 1833

data.event: According to government records, the first land that was owned in what is now known as Portland was owned by Elisha Newman in 1833.
The first post office arrived in 1837.
The first train arrived in Portland in 1869.
The elections are held in November of the odd year.The city council chooses the city manager, the city's chief administrative officer.
